Title: 2023 AI & Data Science Full Time Analyst
Job_Description:
JPMorgan Chase & Co. views data as central to its strategy. Two strategic objectives underpin our ability to use data to drive competitive advantage:
Transition all data and analytics capabilities to the cloud
Modernize data by adopting linked data on the web best practices (e.g., modern structured formats (JSON, XML, etc.), linked, machine-readable metadata)

CCB Data Lake is a platform product within Chase that plays a foundational role in achieving these objectives. The Lake platform enables publishers to easily onboard and publish their data (or links to data) in the cloud. The platform then uses a mesh architecture to enable data consumers to seamlessly access data from any publisher. Though the product is called CCB Data Lake, it's remit goes beyond delimited batch files. From text to video, batch to streaming, the full spectrum of media types and latency is in scope for the Lake.

The Lake platform went live on the cloud in Q2'2022 and is now in the steep portion of its maturity curve building out features and migrating data from legacy on premise systems to the Lake. to support the Lake's Product Manager and Area Product Owners as we mature. Focus areas will change over time but initial efforts will be targeted at enabling end-to-end capabilities for modern, linked data.



Be a key contributor to one of the highest priority business objectives of Chase. Build a network within Chase by engaging with a broad set of users, stakeholders, and engineers to understand critical needs and constraints. Showcase your creativity and product management skill defining product solutions and working with our technology teams to deliver capabilities.



In this exciting role, you will drive product roadmap development for key capabilities we are delivering within the Lake. Initially, you will support our Product Manager and Area Product Owners but over time we expect you partner directly with users, stakeholders, and our technology teams to lead end-to-end definition and delivery for larger and more complex features.

The successful candidate with demonstrate the following:

Title: 2023 AI & Data Science Full Time Analyst
Job_Description:
Control Management is designed to ensure a strong and consistent control environment across the organization from front office to back office, irrespective of line of business or functional area. With control managers appointed for each line of business, function and region, there is a comprehensive coverage/accountability model that promotes firmwide dialogue and consistency in approach and solutions.

Summary

The team is seeking an experienced analytics candidate to develop ETL workflows and datasets in Alteryx and build innovative Tableau dashboards for the control management organization.

Description

Control Management is designed to ensure a strong and consistent control environment across the organization from front office to back office, irrespective of line of business or functional area. With control managers appointed for each line of business, function and region, there is a comprehensive coverage/accountability model that promotes firmwide dialogue and consistency in approach and solutions.

The Control Management Controls Room team works collaboratively with other control disciplines and oversees existing control functions as well as the development of new control functions and protocols. The team's objective is to empower the three lines of defense with risk-based information to manage their control environment. One way we achieve this is by managing and developing applications to monitor and report on the control effectiveness to help mitigate operational risk for the Firm.

The team is seeking an experienced analytics candidate to develop dashboards and innovative analytical solutions for the control management organization. In this role, you will work at the intersection of analytics, user experience, and product development by brainstorming and developing reports through detailed analysis of operational risk data. You will work with business subject matter experts and LOB Control Managers, as well as partner with our Technology software engineers to perform analysis and develop solutions to turn complex, technical concepts into reporting outputs that drive insights for both analytical and non-analytical audiences. You will be responsible for designing and developing ETL workflows and datasets in Alteryx and building new custom Tableau dashboards to meet business requirements.

The ideal candidate will combine deep data insight and a strong analytics skill set with a product development lifecycle experience and understanding. Hands on experience conducting complex analysis on large data sets, involvement in story writing and product development, and a keen eye toward program, project, and analysis completion to meet deadlines are vital for success in this role.
